skillTree.name: Rotting Promethean
skillTree.description: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.

skillTree.name: Lucky Charm
skillTree.description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Deception
skillTree.description: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.

skillTree.name: Kidnapping
skillTree.description: Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 5%
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Bribery
skillTree.description: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"

skillTree.name: Swashbuckler
skillTree.description: If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike true; strike hard.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Taunt
skillTree.description: There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.

skillTree.name: Cutlass
skillTree.description: "Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Vampiric Leap
skillTree.description: The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.

skillTree.name: Wild-Eyed
skillTree.description: "Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"

skillTree.name: Hornswaggle
skillTree.description: You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Establish Pirate Cove
skillTree.description: Smuggling, racketeering, bootlegging – all in a day’s work for the enterprising pirate!

effects.description: Establish Pirate Cove action: -10% cost to perform
Establish Pirate Cove action: -20% cost to perform
Establish Pirate Cove action: -30% cost to perform

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -10% (excludes Establish Pirate Cove action)
Hero action cost: -20% (excludes Establish Pirate Cove action)
Hero action cost: -40% (excludes Establish Pirate Cove action)

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
